structure.unit: ARTICLE XV. DEPARTMENT OF PLANNING, DEVELOPMENT AND REGULATION

law.catch_line: Agricultural Land Use Plan—Relationship to County agencies, boards and departments.

text.section:
Sec. 2-115.9. Agricultural Land Use Plan—Relationship to County agencies, boards and departments.
All County agencies, boards and departments shall take into consideration and be guided by the "Final Proposals of the Agricultural Land Use Plan" when considering and taking action affecting land use and development in Miami-Dade County. In accordance herewith, copies of the ordinance, from which this section derives, together with the "Final Proposals of the Agricultural Land Use Plan," shall be furnished to all affected County boards, departments and agencies and shall be made a part of the public records.
